channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced WordPress Reset
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced WordPress Reset

item.title: CVE-2022-2181|2024-08-03T00:32:08.747Z -- unknown -- advanced%20wordpress%20reset
item.description: The Advanced WordPress Reset WordPress plugin before 1.6 does not escape some generated URLs before outputting them back in href attributes of admin dashboard pages, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
